title: This is a perfect New Yorker Talk of the Town piece: now-divorced...
content:
This is a perfect New Yorker Talk of the Town piece: now-divorced celebs holding a joint thrift sale of their stuff. The sale was advertised on Vogueâ€™s website, was sponsored by an energy drink, and one of the sellers was recording the scene for her podcast.
